title: Riot when is Jhin being released?
body: So basically Jhin was in shop, so i bought him, and of course his disabled and can't be played right now, so when is he going to be released properly?

replies.body:
Hi guys,

Jhin was briefly available for purchase due to an error in the store, but will not be able to be played until the actual release time.
So when is this release time then?
ikr man Riot Gehim tell us we wont tell your boss we swear
